typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> employees
employees aggregate(groupBy(deptid),
	totalemployees = count(empid)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['totalemployeesbydeptid'],
	mapColumn(
		deptid,
		totalemployees
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> totalemployeesbydeptid
